results.content: This course was really very helpful for me as I learned Drupal from Scratch. Also the way of teaching of the instructor is very fine.
results.content_html: This course was really very helpful for me as I learned Drupal from Scratch. Also the way of teaching of the instructor is very fine.

results.content:
this is an awesome course! very clear, very good examples, talks about LOT of stuff in drupal clearly and in a short time, 
and i asked questions about errors and i got replies from the creator of this course,and that is totally awesome... 

One thing i would like to recommend , is to continue this course, by making a more advanced one, like creating modules, working with the code , and especially a drush course, 
since this course is really close to real life, a drush course and module develpment can take this course to be almost a complete course,

Thanks for making this course!
results.content_html:

results.content:
The course provided a great introduction to Drupal for beginners. It is very well organized and live project was useful.
I found Drupal easy to use because a lot of awesome features are already implemented in core and contrib modules, so can be used without coding. However, the themes look really ugly.
results.content_html:
The course provided a great introduction to Drupal for beginners. It is very well organized and live project was useful.
I found Drupal easy to use because a lot of awesome features are already implemented in core and contrib modules, so can be used without coding. However, the themes look really ugly.

results.content: Generally good. My only complaint is the absence of some content like tabbed menu on top and contact page he did not explain
results.content_html: Generally good. My only complaint is the absence of some content like tabbed menu on top and contact page he did not explain

results.content: I do believe this is a great course for someone new to Drupal but for someone who already has experience in Drupal, this may not be all that worth it. If you are a beginner and never did Drupal work then this is the class for you, else if you have experience it may or may not be helpful. With prior Drupal Experience I can still say the videos are well done and the concepts explained very well.
results.content_html: I do believe this is a great course for someone new to Drupal but for someone who already has experience in Drupal, this may not be all that worth it. If you are a beginner and never did Drupal work then this is the class for you, else if you have experience it may or may not be helpful. With prior Drupal Experience I can still say the videos are well done and the concepts explained very well.

results.content: The version of Drupal is a little bit old but still good enough. Also some examples need more preparation on student side and the instructor didn't mention it. The example of Taxonomy seems irrelevant to the book theme of the website example. The Quiz on views covers the topic of blocks which is also confusing.
results.content_html: The version of Drupal is a little bit old but still good enough. Also some examples need more preparation on student side and the instructor didn't mention it. The example of Taxonomy seems irrelevant to the book theme of the website example. The Quiz on views covers the topic of blocks which is also confusing.

results.content:
Course is for beginners who wants to get idea of CMS and Drupal 8.
Beginners should follow this course first before jumping to advance  course mainly the core development.
